attributes.action: ULEZ scrappage scheme should apply to everyone who changed their car
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair to support or extend it to all who scrapped their vehicles within the last week and ignore those to did that earlier
attributes.background: To extend the ULEZ scrappage scheme to all those who bought new car to comply

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the ULEZ car and motorcycle scrappage scheme are a matter for the Mayor of London, rather than a decision about policy or legislation that is made by the Government or Parliament.

You could petition the London Assembly:
https://www.london.gov.uk/who-we-are/what-london-assembly-does/petitions
